website_summaries.verdict: A face oil that works well with many different skin types to balance moisture levels.
pros: Features seaberry oil, which is high in antioxidants, along with cranberry and camellia seed oils to moisturize and improve elasticity
Very moisturizing without being too oily
Balances skin's oil and moisture and banishes dry patches
cons: Has a strong smell that some don't like

customer_reviews.title: Yes try this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2015. I paid 50 dollars with free shipping. I don't understand the price change by the amazon sellers. You can buy this same product on there website. Anywway. The product make my skin soft. I use it at night and I use it under my foundation like a primer. Don't use too much or your face is gonna look oil if your going to use it as a primer. Yes. Its a good product. Yes you should get it if your skin is dry.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality oil which blended well with my skin product. I have purchased this before and will likely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S. from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: A lovely skin oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It really moisturizes, without being at all greasy. It can be used alone or with other skin products
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Use this everyday
customer_reviews.text: I add one drop of this oil in tiny foundation and my skin looks amazing !
customer_reviews.author: LoveShopping123

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dry skin
customer_reviews.text: It’s kinda pricey but this is the best face oil I’ve used so far. My skin is super dry and this product actually makes it softer and moisturized for the rest of the day . This is my second bottle:)
customer_reviews.author: Tetiana

customer_reviews.title: Go to favorite
customer_reviews.text: Works so good for dry sensitive skin. Leave alone or use under moisturizer for even more hydration.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil! Makes my skin glow like the expensive oils but it’s 1/2 the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! My skin around my eyes looks smooth ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My skin around my eyes looks smooth and soft skin.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rovell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this. My skin feels so soft and supple. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GinLu

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I always used any type of lotion for my face.. but my skin started to burn with all of them... I decided to try this product and I absolutely love it... It gives my skin such a healthy glow and leaves it looking and feeling wonderful.. I will never use anything else.... so I certainly hope it never comes off the market!!
customer_reviews.author: JPAM15

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil, I have super dry skin, and it's winter here, this is my second bottle, I apply day and night, nice oil that is not greasy, nice smell, helps to keep my face smooth and not flaky. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia oneill

customer_reviews.title: Finally a moisturizer I can use.
customer_reviews.text: My face is very sensitive to most moisturizers. I am able to use this product with great success and no irritation. For me this is a great accomplishment as most moisturizers make my irritate my face creating redness and swelling. I have used quality brand name moisturizers with horrible reactions and am happy to find this product.
customer_reviews.author: Native Texan

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product under my daily moisturizer and thought it would be greasy, and you think it is but it's not. It absorbs so quickly and my skin has improved and has this healthy glow. I burned my hand terribly with a curling iron while fixing my daughter's hair and later uses this for my face and it just happened to get on my burn which healed so quickly it was shocking. I would highly recommend this product... Julie...age 49
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Two drops, per directions is not enough for me. Smell is pretty strong. But it once on its not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Luvvv it, leaves my skin feeling great, smells great, and even though I just started using it, my skin already feels softer.. definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Long duration and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Not a cream, this goes on like oil, but keeps the presence all day long. Smell is refreshing, but not overwhelming by any means.
customer_reviews.author: bscherrer

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! Box received with the wrong item, less than half the size, and had rocks in the bottom of the box to fill the empty space.
customer_reviews.author: sconnor

customer_reviews.title: sensitive and dry skin felt softer an stayed hydrated all day- amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just 2 drops with my normal moisturizer morning and night-- and my older, sensitive and dry skin felt softer an stayed hydrated all day- amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jamerican

customer_reviews.title: love the scent - we all have different noses...
customer_reviews.text: Others have been critical of the scent. I love it's scent...very fresh and not medicinal to me. Haven't seen anything different with my skin, however. I now use it if I want a little more "moisture" with other makeup. Probably wouldn't buy it again but not sorry I did.
customer_reviews.author: PLou

customer_reviews.title: Acne hack!
customer_reviews.text: Been applying a dab each night as I read that oil, yes oil! and particularly this one can prevent adult acne. And to my amazement, not a single breakout since using this!
customer_reviews.author: Golden Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Seaberry Moisturizing Face Oil
customer_reviews.text: On rating this product with only short-term use as of now, I would rate it as good. It will require a longer period of use to see long-term results.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect for every skin!
customer_reviews.text: I am an actual Makeup artist, and i discovered this little babe a few months ago, and I'm totally OBSESSED. It's amazing for the night routine, and i can feel a real difference morning after. Fresh, moisturizing and not sticky. I can totally recommended to ALL skins and it goes really well under the make up too. Its worthy every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Anelia Bodurova

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I love the smell of it and it leaves me skin feeling soft and not oily or greasy at all. It absorbed nicely and clears up my dry skin. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it is only 50$ at sephora and 70$ here. Go to sephora to purchase this product, don't waste your money here. I usually NEVER take the time to write reviews but I love this product so much that I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but too much $$ on this link!
customer_reviews.text: Why is it almost $70 here when on the Fresh website it's only $50???? I don't get the pricing on these fresh products.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Queen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is WONDERFUL!!! The BEST! I am in love and I will keep this for EVER! Makes my face smooth and soft!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly R. Nance

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, highly recommended (but overpriced on this site)
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product, well worth the price--but it is overpriced on Amazon. I'm over 65, and I use 3-5 drops twice a day mixed with my moisturizer. (I read recently that oil should be used on top of, not mixed with, SPF moisturizer, so I've started doing that.) I never use scented skin care products, but this is an exception. The scent is slightly herbal and a little sweet--not at all perfume-y or heavy. It's a lifesaver in the winter, when my skin is very dry and can be flaky in the chin and forehead areas. I have very mild rosacea, too, and for some reason this oil has helped prevent flareups.
customer_reviews.author: Nelle

customer_reviews.title: No Results, Doesn't Absorb
customer_reviews.text: This oil doesn't absorb well. Furthermore, I haven't seen any results & with other facial oils I've used, I see immediate results. I wasn't so happy with this product. I'd recommend Ole Henricksen Truth Serum Collagen Booster.
customer_reviews.author: LA4321

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Seabury Moisturizing Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent nurturing facial oil for any type of skin. I have used this product for a year now and plan to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

product_meta.title: Fresh Seaberry Moisturizing Face Oil, 1.6 Ounce
product_meta.description: An effective moisturizing facial oil. Features a lightweight formula that absorbs quickly for a boost of vital moisture. Contains a precious blend of pure oils including seaberry, cranberry seed, camellia seed and grapeseed. Packed with nourishing omegas for rejuvenating benefits. Unveils a softer, smoother, plumper and younger looking complexion.
feature_bullets: Features a lightweight formula that absorbs quickly for a boost of vital moisture
Contains a precious blend of pure oils including seaberry, cranberry seed, camellia seed and grapeseed
Packed with nourishing omegas for rejuvenating benefits

specifications.Manufacturer: Mainspring America, Inc. DBA Direct Cosmetics
